title: Metal Bastard's MBGS mixes vol 1-50
description:
The first 50 volumes in this awesome series of mp3 mixes originally posted on the now-defunct blog Metal Bastard Goes Soft. Nowadays check metalbastard[dot]tumblr[dot]com for all of your music needs.
